author: Rick
content:
Well, I found your blog through a photoshop tutorial (http://manessinger.com/2008/05/571-them-there-eyes-ii.html) but enjoyed the daily stuff so much that it's now in my folder of bookmarked blogs and sites to check every morning.

However, everytime I view this blog, I only every view the main page - never clicking through the other links, because I've seen every blog post since for about the last 2 years. Would this be a 'bounce' on your statistics? Could regular readers like me contribute to your higher bounce rate on this blog?
